title: The Visual Microphone: Passive Recovery of Sound from Video
excerpt: Recover audio from tiny surface vibrations using only video. Phase-based motion, rolling shutter tricks, and denoising for intelligible speech.

title: Implementing an FFT in Python and C++
excerpt: Windowing choices, overlap, and validation tips. From NumPy to Eigen with timing notes and correctness checks.

title: SNR: When is a Signal “Good”?
excerpt: Practical intuition for dB, noise sources, and measurement setups so you can judge signal quality quickly.

title: ESP32 BLE Streaming for EKG
excerpt: Streaming EKG over BLE with buffering strategies, packet loss handling, and a Python plotting GUI.
